DOC.criteria: Diagnosis locally advance metastatic colorectal cancer . No prior chemotherapy metastatic disease . Presence radiologically and/or clinically documented disease . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0 1 . Adequate bone marrow , hepatic , renal function , Urine Creatinine Ratio ( UPC ) < A female subject must pregnant breast feeding . Able swallow retain oral medication . Has major surgery , chemotherapy , hormone therapy , investigational agent , radiotherapy within last 28 day Prior treatment pazopanib , oxaliplatin . Known contraindication use oxaliplatin , capecitabine , 5fluorouracil , folinic acid . Participation investigational study within 28 day prior study treatment . Women pregnant lactating . Poorly control hypertension . A history cardiovascular disease , arrhythmia , significant ECG abnormality . Any history stroke . Current use therapeutic warfarin . Known brain metastasis .
